definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: There were two or three suspicious characters hanging about the fairground.
sentences.chinese: 有兩三個可疑分子在集市上閒逛。

sentences.english: The police have been keeping a close watch on the suspects' movements.
sentences.chinese: 警方一直嚴密監視著可疑分子的活動。
這個可疑分子受到監視。

sentences.english: Mrs. Jones identified the suspect by the scar on his face.
sentences.chinese: 瓊斯夫人根據那人臉上的傷疤認出了那個可疑分子。

sentences.english: They zeroed in on the suspicious man.
sentences.chinese: 他們的注意力“集中”在那個可疑分子身上。

sentences.english: The police have been keeping a close watch on the suspects' movements .
sentences.chinese: 警方一直嚴密監視着可疑分子的活動。

definition: to hunt and arrest (fugitives)/to track down and arrest/a manhunt
to do a body search/to frisk
